pr_title: set indexlabel invalid if create or rebuild failed

timeline.message:
set indexlabel invalid if create or rebuild failed

also check if indexlabel invalid when query by index

Change-Id: If890b3bd8c441b63642a2006479cf4ccca9ddf67

timeline.author: javeme

timeline.bodyText: Can't query by label index '%s' due to it is in invalid status
timeline.author: javeme

timeline.bodyText: does save to backend store? seems need to call schemaTx.updateSchemaStatus()
timeline.author: javeme
javeme
javeme
javeme
javeme

timeline.bodyText: should update status to INVALID  when failure to remove vertex/edge label?
timeline.author: javeme

replies.bodyText: no need. Fail to remove vertex/edge label will lead to partial delete of vertices/edges. vertex/edge label need to be still valid for remaining vertices/edges
replies.author: zhoney

timeline.author: javeme

timeline.message:
set vl/el to UNDELETED if fail to delete

Change-Id: I7537bd5aff2b43e8a3ba26c88f83761889386ff3
